All Classes

Class Description
AudioPlayer
AudioPlayer.java- This class demonstrates how audio players can be produced in a factory.
Controller
Controller.java - the controller class for the whole FX project.
ItemType
ItemType.java - This enumerator is used to show the possible types of items.
Main
The main class for the program.
MonitorType
MonitorType.java- this enumerator holds the types of monitors.
MoviePlayer
MoviePlayer.java- This class represents movie players that can be made in the factory.
MultimediaControl
MultimediaControl.java- Interface for classes that implement it have the right methods for it.
Product
Product.java- class used to make methods that will be used for other classes that inherit it.
ProductionRecord
ProductionRecord.java- This class represents how data of the product is recorded
Screen
Screen.java - This class is used to represent the screen that a MoviePlayer can have.
